main event: A circular, white object was observed rotating and moving erratically in the sky near Haverhill, Massachusetts on June 22, 1961.
interesting points: The object's brightness fluctuated and it disappeared rapidly behind some trees.
The witness estimated the object was about 1,000 feet in the air and about the size of a nickel held at arm's length.
The object was observed for about 30 seconds.
Other similar sightings were reported in the area around that time.
The witness was quite concerned about the sighting and requested an Air Force investigation.
sighted object: Circular, white object that appeared to be rotating
photographs: yes, the report indicates photographs were taken
